name: Sports Vision
description: SportsVision turns raw video data into winning strategies. It is an easy-to-use AI platform that takes videos from a mobile phone, a basic camera, or even existing archives and transforms them into real-time, sports science-level insights. No fancy gear,
one_liner: SportsVision turns raw video data into winning strategies. It is an easy-to-use AI platform that takes videos from a mobile phone, a basic camera, or even existing archives and transforms them into real-time, sports science-level insights. No fancy gear,
